templates.name: Apache
templates.description:
Get metrics from mod_status module
https://httpd.apache.org/docs/current/mod/mod_status.html

This template is meant specifically for usage with https://github.com/tiredofit/docker-kopano

items.name: Apache: Total bytes
items.description: Total bytes served

items.name: Apache: Bytes per second
items.description:
Calculated as change rate for 'Total bytes' stat.
BytesPerSec is not used, as it counts average since last Apache server start.

items.name: Apache: Get statistics
items.description:
Getting data from a machine-readable version of the Apache status page.
https://httpd.apache.org/docs/current/mod/mod_status.html

triggers.name: Apache: Failed to fetch status page (or no data for 30m)
triggers.description: Zabbix has not received data for items for the last 30 minutes.

items.name: Apache: Total requests
items.description: A total number of accesses

items.name: Apache: Requests per second
items.description:
Calculated as change rate for 'Total requests' stat.
ReqPerSec is not used, as it counts average since last Apache server start.

items.name: Apache: Uptime
items.description: Service uptime in seconds

items.name: Apache: Version
items.description: Service version

triggers.name: Apache: Version has changed (new version: {ITEM.VALUE})
triggers.description: Apache version has changed. Ack to close.

items.name: Apache: Workers idle cleanup
items.description: Number of workers in cleanup state

items.name: Apache: Workers closing connection
items.description: Number of workers in closing state

items.name: Apache: Workers DNS lookup
items.description: Number of workers in dnslookup state

items.name: Apache: Workers finishing
items.description: Number of workers in finishing state

items.name: Apache: Workers keepalive (read)
items.description: Number of workers in keepalive state

items.name: Apache: Workers logging
items.description: Number of workers in logging state

items.name: Apache: Workers reading request
items.description: Number of workers in reading state

items.name: Apache: Workers sending reply
items.description: Number of workers in sending state

items.name: Apache: Workers slot with no current process
items.description: Number of slots with no current process

items.name: Apache: Workers starting up
items.description: Number of workers in starting state

items.name: Apache: Workers waiting for connection
items.description: Number of workers in waiting state

items.name: Apache: Total workers busy
items.description: Total number of busy worker threads/processes

items.name: Apache: Total workers idle
items.description: Total number of idle worker threads/processes

items.name: Apache: CPU utilization
items.description: Process CPU utilization percentage.

items.name: Apache: Memory usage (Physical)
items.description: Resident set size memory used by process in bytes.

items.name: Apache: Memory usage (Virtual)
items.description: Virtual memory size used by process in bytes.

discovery_rules.name: Event MPM discovery
discovery_rules.description:
Additional metrics if event MPM is used
https://httpd.apache.org/docs/current/mod/event.html

item_prototypes.name: Apache: Bytes per request
item_prototypes.description: Average number of client requests per second

item_prototypes.name: Apache: Connections async closing
item_prototypes.description: Number of async connections in closing state (only applicable to event MPM)

item_prototypes.name: Apache: Connections async keep alive
item_prototypes.description: Number of async connections in keep-alive state (only applicable to event MPM)

item_prototypes.name: Apache: Connections async writing
item_prototypes.description: Number of async connections in writing state (only applicable to event MPM)
